Suukie swam along through the water...going up stream in his nifty beast
mode....until he spotted a white wolf......he had spotted a bot up above as
well.....he did not know Rowdy Wolf or Zyber, but figured he could help them
somehow.....he jumped on land and switched to robot mode.....he then walked
up onto a mountain.. (he loves mountains, they allow him to be seen by all!)
he then called across to Zyber and Rowdy Wolf... (hello, bots, what is and
what nots?" he said, rhyming horribly...trying to get their attention.......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 12:07 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
> *Zyber looked at Rowdy Wolf with the same cool stare that she had first
worn
> when she had met him, she had spent many a long hour just staring at rocks
> and it had payed off!(sarcastic)
> She looked back at him...*
>
> " I have nothing against either the Maximals OR Predacons, they are just
as
> much a being as I and would not judge them any differently then I would
> judge myself. Now, are you quite finished with the questions that are
> starting to indicate that you think that I am some sort of Maximal spy
here
> to get the drop on you?"
>
> * Zyber looked back out at the grasslands and sighed, this new bot was
> starting to get the wrong picture about her.
> She turned her eyes back at Rowdy Wolf but kept her head straight towards
> the field.*
>
> " However, I do think that you play well."
>
